case.state: I won't lose to this game... no matter what!
I hope you're ready, because I'm NOT holding back.
I'm sorry, but only one of us can remain clothed and I intend it to be me!
In the name of the Knights of the Blood Oath, I challenge you... to strip poker!
I'll trade ~cards~ cards.
~cards~ for me.
My hand needs a +~cards~.
Got it!
These cards are S-class!
Thank you, random number generator!
Okay, break time is over.
I can't lose!
Wait until you see this hand!
Finally
I'm saved!
I recognize that uniform - you're a Hikarizaka student, Nagisa?
Let's do this.
P-please, be nice to me...
We may need to team up for this quest.
Don't do anything mean, okay?
Tell me, BlackRose: what's The World like?
Don't count me out just yet!
This won't stop me!
I'll never give up!

state.text: I'm not sure about this hand...

case.state: These cards had better be enough! There's no way I'm going to strip.
I need to spend more time playing if I want to improve.
C-can you please not stare so boldly?
Feel that? There's a bad vibe in here.
Oh, well, that figures.
These cards are beyond fishy, don't you think?
It's no use!
I'm done for!
I can't go on...
I miss the ability to log out...
I shouldn't even be here! I just logged in on my brother's account!
Just kill me now!
Save me, Kirito-kun!
Pft! I'm so dumb!
Rules are rules. Just look away.
My heart's pounding...
Guess I've got no choice...
This is like that time those acid slimes attacked me in the bathhouse.
If I cared about looking like this, I wouldn't have come here in the first place!
I never wanted to wear this uniform anyway... the others made me.
Why do you look so happy? Do you have some kind of underwear fetish?
...Don't panic, Asuna. You won't be half-naked, you'll just be... in the default gear.
So if I don't strip naked, I can't continue on my quest?
My p-panties? But they're an S-class item! If I take them off, I'll be-- like everyone else. Okay.
Th-this is embarrassing!
You're going to treat me to dinner after this!
I have to do this to become strong!
The quest reward had better be worth this...
Everyone is counting on me!
It's embarrassing when you look at me like that...
Sigh! You're so greedy.
You'd better not tell anyone about this!
Could I get you to take an oath of secrecy?
My p-panties? But they're an S-class item! If I take them off, I'll be-- Ugh. Fine.
Geez, you dummy!
You shouldn't let a girl go first!
Hmph! Beginner's luck.
Don't stare at me so much!
No quest reward is worth this humiliation!
I've had just about enough of feeling powerless!
I don't give a damn if this is a virtual world. My feelings are real! And right now I'm feeling embarrassed.
What should I do? Should I just run?
Are you some kind of player killer?!
I'm only doing this because it's a game.
There's no way I'm going to take off my wedding ring! Which only leaves... oh, no.
It's embarrassing, being like this alone...
I hate all of you!
Ugh, fine. I'll take off my Prancing Boots.
I'll remove my stockings, I guess.
My gloves are the obvious choice.
... How about my belt?
Do you have any idea how much this outfit cost?
My hit points are getting into the yellow range...
I'm having a flashback to when I was Sugou's prisoner.
For the record, this isn't why they call me the Flash.
I can always go on the Laketop Fortress quest again if I want a new pair.
They're part of the Knights of Blood uniform - I can always get a new pair.
I don't need the bonus to attack in a safe zone, anyway.
It's not even magical. I've got four more in my inventory!
D-don't look! Not yet anyway.
The joke's on you: my skirt was about to run out of durability anyway.
Since you've seen what no one should see, how are you going to repay me?
Sometimes the things that matter most are right in front of you. Like my breasts.
Being stared at by you from so close makes me blush.
You should see your face! I guess you've never had a girlfriend before.
This'll be easier than I thought!
Your skill level is too low for this quest, ~name~.
Lucky!
Yes!
I think you're underestimating women, ~name~.
Serves you right, ~name~.
Phew! That was lucky.
This'll be easier than I thought!
Your skill level is too low for this quest, ~name~.
Lucky!
I think you're underestimating women, ~name~.
Yes!
Serves you right, ~name~.
Phew! That was lucky.
Getting the competition out of the way!
Need some tips on playing, ~name~?
At least we're not playing for money.
Ooh, bad luck, ~name~!
Keep your guard up, ~name~!
I won't lose to an opponent like you!
Yes!
I can still win!
Show me what you've got, ~name~!
If only I could have held on just a little longer...
Sigh... fine.
Having a blonde moment, ~name~? I do that all the time.
I thought you said you'd played this before, ~name~.
And here I thought you were going to be a challenge!
You look like you're enjoying this, ~name~. Your gamer spirit is all fired up!
Are you trying to lose, ~name~?
Bad move, ~name~.
You've got to do better than that, ~name~!
Nothing personal, ~name~...
Need some tips on playing, ~name~?
Getting the competition out of the way!
At least we're not playing for money.
Ooh, bad luck, ~name~!
Keep your guard up, ~name~!
I won't lose to an opponent like you!
Yes!
I can still win!
Show me what you've got, ~name~!
If only I could have held on just a little longer...
Sigh... fine.
Oh! Do you have magic ~clothing~?
Ah! That's magical, isn't it?
Oh! There's a magical aura around your ~clothing~!
J-just hurry up and drop out!
Ugh... I hate min-maxers. Play the game as it's designed to be played!
I see an aura around your ~clothing~...
If you're counting that as clothing, that had better be S-class.
I see you have a flexible definition of 'clothing'.
Yes! It's a rare loot drop: the ~clothing~ of strength!
The ~clothing~ of protection +2... where did you find that?
Ooh, a rare loot drop: ~clothing~ of vigor +4!
I've got to try harder!
At least your defenses are down now.
Another rare loot drop: ~clothing~ of luck! ...Wait. Luck? ARE YOU CHEATING?
Stupid game.

state.text: Care to sit? I'm sure it would take some weight off your cloven hooves. You goat.

case.state: Just regular ones? Do they even count, then?
Does... does that happen often to you, Leela?
Don't be crude, Buffy!
So... you're some kind of magic user, right?
Adding insult to injury, Buffy? I won't regret taking you down one bit.
So, ~name~, you're a princess? Doesn't that make you an NPC?
The game begins... and ~name~ is already losing!
Not bad, for an opening move.
Ah! That's magical, isn't it?
I like your ~clothing~, ~name~ - beautiful and powerful.
Oh! There's a magical aura around your ~clothing~!
I have mixed feelings. Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ gorgeous, but ~clothing.ifPlural(they're|it's)~ also delaying my victory.
J-just hurry up and drop out!
Ugh... I hate min-maxers. Play the game as it's designed to be played!
I see an aura around your ~clothing~...
If you're counting that as clothing, that had better be S-class.
I see you have a flexible definition of 'clothing'.
I'm sorry, my English sometimes fails me. What did you say?
Of course they're not for keeps... They'd better not be for keeps!
Go ahead and quit, BlackRose: it means less competition for me!
If it's a fight you're looking for, it's a fight you'll get from me!
Then I'll just have to break through your guard!
I've never seen one wearing clothes like yours. Do they give you some kind of bonus?
Please don't take this personally, but I've had a lifetime of doctors already, Angela.
That means I can go all out against you!
I might just win this game yet!
It's a good start for me!
Oh, my mistake---just ~clothing.ifPlural(|an)~ ordinary ~clothing~. ~clothing.ifPlural(Do they|Does it)~ really count, then?
The ~Clothing~ of Speed +3... where did you find that?
I need to upgrade my equipment.
Yes, it's a rare loot drop: the ~clothing~ of charm! Don't worry, you're still charming even without it.
It's too bad you couldn't get ~clothing~ of luck! Too bad for you, anyway.
I've got to try harder!
At least your defenses are down now.
Another rare loot drop: ~clothing~ of luck! ...Wait. Luck? You'd better not be cheating!
Stupid game.
Wow, that really ticks me off!
That's it? I need a healer! Or... what? A seamstress?
This game is rigged!
Care to sit? I'm sure it would take some weight off your cloven hooves. You goat.
Your overconfidence will be your downfall, Xander.
A wise move.
I see you've maxed your apparel skill. That's paying off for you tonight.
Keep this up and you'll never get a girlfriend!
Removing your ~clothing~? Okay.
~Name~, you sly fox!
Don't try to act cool all by yourself.
I see you've maxed your apparel skill.
~Name~-kun, you're not going to try to back out now, are you?
S-stop teasing me, ~name~!
You... you... you dummy!
I'm glad to see you came prepared!
Don't take this the wrong way, but I'm going to have to beat you if I want that prize.
You really need to get a girlfriend.
Do you gain experience from something so small?
It's a start.
You really prepared for this game, didn't you?
My Kirito is worth three of you!
You can't keep this up forever.
Why do you look so smug and relaxed? That's so infuriating!
It seems I've got a lot to learn about playing this game.
Clearly, I need a new strategy.
You are an awful person.
Care to sit? I'm sure it would take some weight off your cloven hooves. You goat.

state.text: Don't gloat. It doesn't suit you.

case.state: In... both senses? I'm sorry, Kim - I'm not familiar with that idiom.
You poor thing!
A wise move.

state.text: You're proving to be a difficult opponent... exactly what I expected.

case.state: I see you've maxed your apparel skill. That's paying off for you, huh?
I see you've maxed your apparel skill. That's paying off for you tonight.
I can't believe I expected this to be a fair fight!
You have the most incredible luck, ~name~.
Removing your ~clothing~? Okay.
~Name~, you sly fox!
I see you've maxed your apparel skill.
What is this, some kind of boss fight?
How are you so good at this?
This has got to be some kind of server glitch.
It's funny how arrogant you're being, BlackRose. That prize is all mine!
Sometimes I wish I could be as free as you, Buffy.

state.text: I don't get it... Don't they have healers in your server?

case.state: Oh, that counts? I should be taking notes!
I'm glad to see you came prepared!
Don't take this the wrong way, but I'm going to have to beat you if I want that prize.
Let's make a deal, ~name~: let me win and I'll introduce you to my guildmates!
Do you gain experience from something so small?
There's more strategy to this game than I realized.
You really prepared for this game, didn't you?
Maybe you've prepared for this game - for three days straight I've been working on a stupid quest!
Clearly, I need a new strategy.
Just lose already!
It seems I've got a lot to learn about playing this game.
Don't look down on me!
Lucky at cards, unlucky at love.
Care to sit? I'm sure it would take some weight off your cloven hooves. You goat.
You... you... you dummy!
Serves you right! I can't believe you're trying to get me naked when you already have someone.
I, Asuna, vice commander of the Knights of the Blood Oath, command you to remove your ~clothing~!
Such a gentleman!
This will teach you!
...Is there a prize for coming in second?
An honorable man wouldn't be playing this if he had a girlfriend. Would he, ~name~?
Being a solo player has its limits, doesn't it?
This is going to be a short game!
That's why you shouldn't let your laundry pile up!
If you give up now, I promise to be gracious in victory.
...I feel like I'm cheating on Kirito, somehow.
It's not cheating if it's a game, right?
Stalling tactics won't work, you know.
You say that like it's supposed to mean something to me.
I'm sorry, May! I didn't mean to!
You're so cheerful about losing... do you know something I don't?
Let this be a lesson: You should never go into battle unprepared!
I'd like to say I'm sorry about this, but I'm not.
I'm sorry about this...
Come back when you've levelled up!
You're like a tornado!
A critical hit!
Get used to losing, ~name~.
Is your heart racing too, ~name~?
...Is there a prize for coming in second?
So, um, you like stripes, Alice-san?
Do you get a bonus for having a matched set like that?
You poor thing! We may be rivals, but that doesn't mean I hate you, D.Va. Come here.
I thought you were going to quit! Too bad for you.
You want a hug? You're the worst - trying to trick me into letting my guard down!
I'd hug you, but I doubt you'd want to touch me right now. Would you?
The way you talk reminds me of my father's lawyers. I have the sudden urge to scream.
Hee hee hee! Sorry, ~name~. It's just that your bra looks like dango!
Hee hee hee! Dango bra!
...Although you're handling it well. Better than I would, honestly.
You're trying too hard, ~name~! That's not the way to find a boy, trust me.
This feels like I'm picking on a newbie.
And my guild thought I couldn't handle myself!
Want to concede the match, ~name~?
That quest reward is as good as mine!
I've met NPCs who played better than you!
Aren't you glad this isn't happening in real life?
Why are you so indifferent to this, ~name~?
Aren't you glad this isn't happening in real life? This... this isn't happening in real life, right?
So we both happen to be wearing our best underwear today... What are the odds of that?
I can't even look at you without blushing!
Please, ~name~. Don't stop there on my account.
I'm sorry about this...
You know what? I'm not sorry about this!
Oh... are we playing on easy mode? Nobody told me.
~Name~. What are you doing?
I'm not interested in you! I'm just trying to win.
Life isn't just doing things for yourself. Other people's happiness can make you happy. Right now, you're making me very happy, ~name~.
Wait... so what was all that silence about then?
I don't think you're taking this seriously, ~name~.
It's not like I want to see that!
There's no place to run even if you feel embarrassed!
Doing that is unfair!
So this is why we had to turn our moral codes off, huh?
After this I'll treat you to dinner, ~name~.
This could knock you out of the running, ~name~...
I-I think I'm suffering from a stunning status effect!
I'd always heard Gaijin were supposed to be bigger than that.
Bringing a dagger to a swordfight? You're braver than I thought.
I-I think I'm suffering from a stunning status effect!
It's just a game! It's just a game! It's just a game!
It's gotten-- You idiot! What's your problem?
When I think of you being next to me like this, my heart starts racing and I can't calm down.
I-I think I'm suffering from a stunning status effect!
A two-hander? Those are rare.
It's not just big, it's hard as a rock!
You'd break me!
And, um, gyoza to you, Nagisa.
...I expected you to blush. Have I fallen into some kind of trap?
Nothing personal, ~name~. It's only a game!
Hee hee! Looks like someone's blushing!
What are you, stupid?

state.text: No wonder the other guild members were lining up for this quest!

case.state: This is just like bathing together. That's all. I can handle this.
This reminds me of the health inspections in high school.
I'd say I'm shocked that there's a strip poker quest in the game, but, well... this is Japan we're talking about.

state.text: Bathing together was never like this!

case.state: You know, the rules don't say you have to twirl like that...
Wh-what are you doing, ~name~? Everyone will see you!
This is why you don't make charisma a dump stat. Heh.
Oh! I feel so motherly.
...Honestly, Nagisa? It kind of is.
Wh-what are you doing, ~name~? Everyone will see you!
I'm glad I decided to come instead of Kirito. He doesn't need to see this!
You remind me of one of my friends...
You've got a long way to go before you can challenge me.
Wh-what are you doing, ~name~? Everyone will see you!
~Name~, stop! Stop! Your breasts are swaying!
I see where someone decided to spend her attribute points...
Another rival? Kirito is mine.
~Name~'s size is big. I'm envious of her...
Pft! Like you had any dignity to begin with!
So this is why we had to turn our moral codes off, huh?
Am I... am I the bad guy here?
If only there were a way for us both to win...
How lewd!
After this we'll both need a break!
This could knock you out of the running, ~name~...
Oh! I guess you weren't planning on playing today...
Oh! I-I wasn't expecting it to be bare.
It's just like going to a hot spring together! Sort of.
It's just like going to a hot spring together! ...With a shameless, sexually experienced woman.
D-does your boyfriend like it that way?
I wonder if Kirito would like it if I shaved mine bare like yours...
Oh! D-Do boys really like it untrimmed like that?
I feel bad for beating you so easily...
Hey, ~name~! Don't jump like that since you're naked.
It's just like going to a hot spring together! That's all!
This really isn't so bad! I've bathed with my friends dozens of times.
This tells me a lot more about you than I'd ever wanted to know.
How pretty! I didn't think of keeping mine trimmed that way.
You're soaked! Are you the sensitive type?

state.text: This is one sick, twisted game...

case.state: Time to show your skills, ~name~...
That makes me feel a little better.
Wh-what do you think you're doing?
Sexual harassment! It's sexual harassment!
I see you're a dual wielder - just like Kirito!
We both have someone already, so stop looking at me while you do that!
Hey! What are you staring at?
You're lucky this is part of the game. If you did that any other time, you'd be sent to prison!
D-don't look at me while you do that, ~name~!
I understand that boys need to... to find release. Just get it over with.
Oh, fine. Stare at me if it makes you happy.
Pervert!
So this is what you like, ~name~.
I can't get married any more...
Um... ~name~? D-do you want to join my guild?
I knew it had to come to this, but I can't feel good about winning this way.
Well... rules are rules, ~name~!
This makes me feel a little better...
I hope none of you are crude enough to peep on ~name~ while she does this!
Hold on! Of course that's a no!

state.text: If I had to lose, at least I'll be in good company.

case.state: I was taught that good girls didn't do what you're doing, ~name~. Or quite so enthusiastically.
I-- I don't need to do that! I have Kirito!
Are there skill levels for masturbating? How did you get so good at it?
I was taught that good girls didn't do this. But here we are.
How did you get so good at that? Can you... teach me?
How shameless...
The game designers are perverts!
You looked so animalistic just now. Like you didn't care we were watching. How?
Th-this is my first time!
I've seen that same look on guy's faces... but not while naked.
When you die in Aincrad you die in real life. ...I wish we were playing by those rules right now. Fine! I'll do it.
Before I met Kirito, I didn't do things like this. Have I... become a bad girl?
Am-Am I doing this right?
Th-this is nothing!
They've really increased the sensation in the game, haven't they? It's like I'm really doing this.
My mother would disown me if she could see this... that just turns me on more!
I'm at my limit!
Kirito-kun!!!
I can only hope Kirito is doing better than me...
If I find out there was cheating I'll report you to the GM!
At least none of my fans saw me...
Do you hate me now?
Somehow this is worse than being defeated in battle.
I got carried away and only ended up getting in the way...
It's a perfect victory!
In the end it's not about winning this way or losing. It's having fun!
I know this is just a game, but it feels like the time I spent here was the first time in my life that I really felt alive.
You must be a GM in disguise!
Please forget about this when you return to the real world!
What? This is the quest reward?!

scene.directive: Come on! These scrubs aren't worth our time. The boss is just ahead!
Ha! This update isn't so bad. We're gonna be the first ones to clear the floor!
Sinon! Watch out!
Ugh! It's strong.
Be careful, ~name~! Its attack adds some kind of status effect.
Leafa! I need healing!
Asuna! An opening!
Got it!
That status effect is still active, though. What is it? There's no popup text.
Cure all isn't removing it.
I don't recognize it. It must be part of the update.
Does it matter? We're not losing HP, and I can still use magic.
You're right. Let's just grab the loot and move on to the next floor.
Health potions.
An axe? Weak.
Ooh, new boots! What did you get, ~name~?
Glasses? Well, put them on!
~name~? You're not moving.
Do you see anything with the lenses on?
...You're not saying anything, ~name~. I'm worried.
I think you need a Healing Kiss. Maybe several.
Hey, my hit points are the lowest! Can I get some of those kisses, Asuna?
